name: Advanced Swimming Simulator
overview: This is a joke entry for the 2004 Crap Game compo. Where you are swimming the Atlantic Ocean, and must try and get to the island. The only trouble is, you can easily get lost. You have a very long distance to travel and swim to the shore. If you run out of time, game is over. Actually think reality? It is impossible to swim across the whole Atlantic Ocean don't you think?
